detail_desc: Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
Sleeveless top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a slight sheen. Decorative button band down the front.

Lightweight popover jacket in windproof, functional fabric designed to shut out the wind and keep you comfortable. Mesh-lined, drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap at the top, and a patch pocket with a flap and hook and loop fastening at the front. Covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined. The polyamide content of the jacket is recycled.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.

Blouse in airy, dobby-weave cotton with a plumeti texture. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed tiers on the sleeves and to the hem.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Sleeveless, fitted dress in ribbed slub jersey with a V-neck front and back and decorative buttons down the front.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a double-layered, gathered stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders and long, voluminous sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft loose knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Extended section at the hem in woven fabric.
Fully lined bikini top with a light shimmer with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Decorative ties at the front and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Fitted top in jersey with wide shoulder straps and a knot detail at the top.
Coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist with a jacquard-weave elastic waistband.
Bracelet in braided imitation leather with a magnetic metal fastener.
Short shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bomber jacket in linen with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, an inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with pleats at the top and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length pleated skirt in soft imitation leather with a waistband and concealed zip in one side.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with long sleeves, a print motif on the front and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Dungaree shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip at the back and shoulder straps with adjustable fastenings that cross at the back.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a slit in one side.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from cotton and silk.
Round-necked top in soft jersey. Short, elasticated puff sleeves in an airy weave with a frill trim, and a straight-cut hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline, gathers at the shoulders, short puff sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.
Fitted, turtleneck top in mesh with long sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with cut-off, raw edges.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with a concealed button at the top. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hair clips in glittery metal with a padded star covered in reversible sequins at the top.
Fitted body in jersey with a V-neck at the front and a low-cut back. Elbow-length sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bralette in lace and mesh with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waistband, back pocket and straight, wide legs with decorative seams at the front and roll-edge hems.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Tight fit.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, textured plastic rings at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Cylindrical bag in woven fabric with handles and a shoulder strap in a contrasting colour. Recycled polyester lining. Length 39 cm. Height 22 cm.

Ankle-length dress in sequin-embroidered tulle made from recycled polyester. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a corset bodice with padded cups at the front and concealed boning front and back. Silicone trim at the top to hold the dress in place and a concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Seam at the waist with an inset band and a flared skirt with decorative gathers at the waist. Lining in soft jersey made from recycled polyester.
Mules in imitation suede with pointed toes. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Short, flared skirt with a patent finish in a wraparound style with an asymmetric flounce at the front and raw edges. Concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
ACE TEE x H&M. Choker in soft faux fur with a decorative faux fur pompom at the back. Adjustable length 32-39 cm.
5-pocket shorts in supersoft stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fly with a button.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with double frills in woven fabric around the armholes.
Joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Small shoulder bag in imitation leather made from Vegea™ and water-based polyurethane that can also be used as a clutch. Concealed magnetic fastening at the top, a zipped inner compartment and a narrow, detachable shoulder chain. Zip at the sides with a metal tab in the shape of a bunch of grapes decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Recycled polyester lining. VEGEA™ is an innovative, leather-like vegan material made from bio-waste produced during the winemaking process.
Long-sleeved hoodie in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an extra-wide neckline, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, button placket, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck opening and ties at the neckline. Pleated stand-up collar and a pleated trim around the armholes. Lined.
Straight-cut, boat-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a small frill around the neckline, and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a frill trim.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. One long-sleeved and one short-sleeved printed top. One pair of long bottoms and one pair of shorts, both with an elasticated waist.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and soft faux fur pompom. Diameter 5 cm, length approx. 12 cm.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Knitted jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front and front pockets.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Hat in soft, rib-knit chenille.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is slightly longer at the back. 3/4-length leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
